data.title: installing Omnisphere
data.meta_description: If ever you need to re-install Omnisphere and don’t have access to your original installation media, we’ve provided a simple and easy solution. Every...
data.text:
If ever you need to re-install Omnisphere and don’t have access to your original installation media, we’ve provided a simple and easy solution.

Every Omnisphere user receives credit for a limited number of additional full product downloads.

Simply log in to your User Account, select the “REINSTALL” tab, then click on “Download Available.”

Click on “AGREE” to signify you understand the terms of our our license.

Select the DLM for your computer’s OS and follow the prompts—that’s it!
